requirementText: The implementation of the `MessageParser` also defines the syntax for making edits to files. This syntax is similiar to the syntax of writing whole files with the difference that it contains a SEARCH block and a REPLACE block so the LLM can define which lines in a file to replace with new content. The search block starts with '<<<<<<< SEARCH', the REPLACE block ends with '>>>>>>> REPLACE' and both blocks are separated by '======='
